credits.title: Shift Credits
credits.tooltip: Use Shift Credits to apply to jobs. Credits reduce low-quality bids and help you get hired faster.

modal.subheader: Apply to jobs instantly. Credits reduce spam and boost your visibility.
modal.success: Credits purchased — ₹{amount} added to your balance.
modal.error: Purchase failed. Try again or contact support.

empty.headline: No credits yet
empty.body: You need Shift Credits to apply for jobs. Buy credits now or upgrade to a subscription (credits included).

modal.usageNote: When you apply to a job, {credits_per_application} credits are reserved. If your proposal is withdrawn or the client does not view it within 72 hours, credits will be refunded automatically.
modal.expiryNote: Credits expire after 12 months of inactivity.

pricing.note: Prices shown are estimates. Final amounts display at checkout.

tooltips.platformFeeTitle: Platform fee — what 2ndShift charges to run payments, support, escrow, and talent verification.
tooltips.platformFeeBody: This fee helps us run escrow, vet talent, and provide dispute resolution. It's taken from the job total per platform configuration.
tooltips.escrowBody: A small fee for secure payment handling and instant payouts where available.
tooltips.workerPayoutBody: The amount the worker receives after platform fees are deducted. Taxes or local withholding may apply.

clientCheckout.title: Confirm payment & fund escrow
clientCheckout.body: You will be charged ₹{total}. Platform fee: ₹{platform_fee}. Escrow: ₹{escrow_fee}. Worker will receive: ₹{worker_payout}.

growth.title: Growth
growth.tagline: Zero platform fee for your hires

client.footerNote: Subscriptions auto-renew monthly. Cancel anytime. Fees are non-refundable for partial months unless otherwise stated in the terms.

basic.label: Basic Verified
basic.tooltip: Identity confirmed. Suitable for most microtasks.

professional.label: Professional Verified
professional.tooltip: Skills and a microtask test verified. Higher visibility and priority for relevant jobs.

premium.label: Premium Verified
premium.tooltip: In-depth technical assessment passed + work sample validated. Eligible for high-ticket assignments.

availability.label: Available Now
availability.tooltip: Actively accepting tasks and ready to start within the selected delivery window.

speed.label: Fast Responder
speed.tooltip: Average response time < 2 hours. Shown for workers who respond quickly.

instantPayout.label: Instant Payout
instantPayout.tooltip: Eligible for instant payout option (subject to worker subscription or fees).

notifications.creditsPurchaseSubject: Credits purchased — ₹{amount} added to your 2ndShift balance
notifications.jobFundedSubject: Your job "{title}" is funded and live
notifications.deliveryNotification: {worker_name} delivered "{job_title}". Review & approve to release escrow.

insufficientCredits.title: Not enough Shift Credits
insufficientCredits.body: You need {credits_per_application} credits to apply. Buy credits or upgrade your subscription.

paymentFailed.title: Payment failed
paymentFailed.body: We couldn't process your payment. Try again or contact support.

accessDenied.title: Access restricted
accessDenied.body: This page is for {role}s only. Switch to the correct role or contact support.

helpSnippets.whatAreCredits: Credits are the application currency — they limit spam, reward serious applicants, and improve match quality.
helpSnippets.howIsFeeCalculated: A percentage of the job total, configurable per platform. It covers escrow, dispute resolution, and verification services.
helpSnippets.whatIsEscrow: Escrow holds payment securely until job completion. It protects both client and worker.
helpSnippets.whyVerify: Verified profiles get higher visibility, bigger jobs, and higher earnings.
